text: Student voices on the PYP Exhibition -Stage 1   The story so far… What really matters What would you do if you could change the world? A different kind of conference A different kind of conference -2

That is really very awesome and inspiring. I think the focus on developing and encouraging student awareness, empowerment and inquiry is truly wonderful. Will there be any formal student directed projects to build off of the conference?
Edna, Love the way the children sum up their thoughts in one word or a sentence. Makes me proud to see how they have progressed because I have taught most of the kids either in Grade 4 or 5.
The stdents show a wonderful appreciation of the task ahead. It’s a joy to see their enthusiasm.
